name: AoA #150: Boon A - Legacy of Ashes

description.value: You can make a first-level character with one of the following backgrounds: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Aiudara Seeker]{Aiudara Seeker}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Hermean Heritor]{Hermean Heritor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Legendary Parents]{Legendary Parents}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Touched by Dahak]{Touched by Dahak}
